title: My account
body: so as I am atm I have a banned accountperma banned and I was wondering since you unbanned tyler fucking 1 you can unban that account cause it has the most skins and money put into it I currently already have another lvl 30 accounts that is on a higher rank but I just want my good old skins back without paying the 120 dollars again Plz rito {{item:3690}}

replies.body: You're more than welcome to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to talk about the other accounts you have. I wouldn't want to go into too much detail on the boards due to the risk of giving out personal info.
